mapper.insert:
select counsel_seq.nextval from dual
insert into Counsel(counsel_id, user_tel1 ,user_tel2 ,user_tel3 ,counsel_category, counsel_content ,counsel_regdate ,counsel_result ,counsel_result_flag,admin_id) values(#{counselId},#{user_tel1},#{user_tel2},#{user_tel3},#{counsel_category}, #{counsel_content},#{counsel_regdate},#{counsel_result},#{counsel_result_flag},#{admin_id})
